item.title: IMPORTANT! Expect an email in the next few day containing important information regarding the Eldritch builds.
Eldritch Skin/Build updates were last made on October 23rd 2017. Eldritch Source updates were last made on December 25th 2017.
The Eldritch Wizard is being renamed "Kayn's Wizard", and the Eldritch repository is being renamed "Kayn's Repository".
The upcoming VOID build is being created and is set to be the replacement for the Eldritch Builds. More details to come in the next email update.
Please email "kaynfiretvguru@gmail.com" for any issues you have with your build.
